transcript:
Customer: Hi, if you record your name and reason for calling, I'll see if this person is available.
Customer: Anurag from IndiaMART.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, speaking, Chitra Digi showroom.
Customer: Ah, nahi main unko beta baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Ji, ji sir, Anurag baat kar raha hun main IndiaMART.com se senior manager sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ji, kal aapne call kiya tha na Nidhi ke number pe?
Customer: Ah.
Customer: Aapne shayad karwaye honge, mere ko pata nahi hai.
Customer: Woh kisi reason se karwaye honge shayad.
Customer: Haan haan haan, theek hai theek hai. Toh ek baar baat kara dijiye sir se pehle toh.
Customer: Main aapko 10 minute mein karwa raha hun na. Aur mere ko ek cheez bhi puchna tha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ah, yeh us din aap hi se baat hui thi kya yeh uske ah ah uske liye vyapar app ke liye?
Executive: Haan mujhse hi hui thi.
Customer: Achcha woh ek baar mere ko na mere ko mila nahi woh mail mein main search kiya hun.
Executive: Koi nahi, main ek baar video meeting par aap available ho jayega, main dikha dunga aapko.
Customer: Achcha achcha, theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Haan, aap ek baar sir se mujhe call back kara dijiye ek baar.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to talk to the concerned person.

- Did not receive the business app mail.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to connect the call in 10 minutes.

- Executive offered to show the app in video meeting.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call connection, vyapar app, video meeting
